Name: Mouse Cursor
About the game: Mouse pointer (cursor) Theme software can change the mouse theme style. Use with beautiful wallpaper, wonderful! Make your computer more personalized! This software is green software, will not modify any computer icons, after uninstalling there will be no residue. Close to restore the default mouse cursor!
